name: apexobj
description: Apex Legends data in Object form. Synchronous, performant and completely local - has no runtime dependencies and doesn't query mozambiquehe.re or any other external APIs.

scripts.test: npm run test:lint && npm run test:format && npm run test:compile && npm run test:behaviour && echo 'All tests passed successfully.'
scripts.test:lint: npx eslint . && echo 'No linting errors detected.'
scripts.test:compile: npx tsc --noEmit && echo 'No TypeScript compilation errors detected.'
scripts.standardise:all: npm run standardise:lint && npm run standardise:format
scripts.prepare: npm run standardise:all && npm run build && npm test && echo 'Module has been successfully built and tested.'

author: Dan Foy
